## CharityORG.destroyPiece() method

Destroys an active piece

**Signature:**

```typescript
destroyPiece(name): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | (not declared) | The name of the banner piece to destroy |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the piece was destroyed, False if not.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0 GB

Destroys an active piece to make room for another.
